name: Steel Defender

trait.name: Hit Points
text: 2 + your Intelligence modifier + five times your artificer level (the defender has a number of Hit Dice [ d8s] equal to your artificer level)

action.name: Force-Empowered Rend
text: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. 1d8 + PB force damage.

action.name: Repair (3/Day)
text: The magical mechanisms inside the defender restore 2d8 + PB hit points to itself or to one construct or object within 5 feet of it.

reaction.name: Deflect Attack
text: The defender imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of one creature it can see that is within 5 feet of it, provided the attack roll is against a creature other than the defender.

description: Source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War p. 61
